name: Cozy Cottage
desc: You enter a cozy cottage with a warm fireplace.

name: Enchanted Forest
desc: A magical forest filled with sparkling lights and mystical creatures.

name: Secret Cave
desc: A hidden cave with glittering crystals and a mysterious aura.

name: Mystic Riverbank
desc: A serene riverbank with glowing water and calming whispers in the air.

name: Dragon's Lair
desc: A cave with the majestic presence of a slumbering dragon.

name: Whimsical Meadow
desc: A colorful meadow with dancing flowers and playful creatures.
